Blood and Makoto:=

The Story of the Shinsengumi Told in Three Volumes
(WORK IN PROGRESS)

is =
a proposal/outline/model for anyone "out there" whether they be
fans, write=
rs, researchers and academics who visit the site

* basically the goal is t=
o address the historical and pop-cultural
impact of our Miburo in a logical=
 multi-facted way. "Blood and Makoto"
a fantasy project will approach the S=
hinsengumi in detail and in a
very *calm and *cool fashion--the aim should =
be information [not]
propaganda.

*Hillsborough's Shinsengumi book is ok wi=
th info but because it didn't
occur to him how important his work would be =
to any reader and
especially us fans who waited forever to get our hands on=
 it, his tone
was inappropriate---"Blood and Makoto" is an attempt to EXPAN=
D on his
work and build a respectable knowledge base for all future fans.

=
* the outline will have dimensions previously unexplored like "THE
TAMA NET=
WORK" because I myself have placed great emphasis on the post
1868 Aizu net=
work (which was relevant specifically to Saitou Hajime or
FUJITA GORO) when=
 in fact the TAMA NETWORK (including the sworn
brother of Kondou Isami), re=
latives on the side of Hijikata's family
and many gono or wealthy farmers n=
ot only provided financial support
but even tried to contribute MANPOWER (n=
ohei) to the dispersing and
reorganizing Shinsengumi after the battle of To=
ba & Fushima

The reason why the TAMA NETWORK has not been discussed is bec=
ause it
is much more difficult to resaerch in English than the Aizu Network=
.

Only William M. Steele's work (noted right on the outline) explores
the =
mighty TAMA NETWORK. I have notes on these families now I gotta
find them..=
.

* WE NEED YOUR HELP---this "model" is by fans [for] fans. What would

 like to know about the Shinsengumi?  Let us know so we can list it

rch?
